data.persona: I am better and smarter than a raven. I see more than he. I know so much.
data.description:
You are in the Pond.
The pond is extremely dirty and has many dead creatures in it. The area surrounding the pond is dead, and there is no sign of plants or animals near the pond. The ground around the pond is soft and contains footprints of the people who visit the pond.
There's the ground, some footprints, a pond, some dead creatures, and some water here.
A horse is here.

You are carrying some food.

            "extra_desc": "The wasteland pond is the one stop for the peasants of the village when they require water. data.short_motivation: I need to satisfy my hunger
data.mid_motivation: I need to eat to be able to feed my chicks.
data.long_motivation: Feeding my chicks would guarantee them surviving into adulthood.
